Adapterfilter
Monitoring
Filter on Adapters, used by Triggers.

Syntax
Copy
<Adapterfilter />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
adapter	text	-
Set the name of the Adapter that this AdapterFilter filters on.
active	text	-
If defined and empty or false, then this element and all its children are ignored
Nested Components
COMPONENT NAME	DESCRIPTION	CARDINALITY
source	Add the name of a SubObject (such as a Pipe) to be included in the filter.	0 .. n
